title: Lotte Kopecky Uncorks Huge Sprint to Snatch Paris-Roubaix Femmes
content:
World champion denies Balsamo and Georgi in the velodrome to make perfect comeback from disappointment at Tour of Flanders.

Read the full article at Lotte Kopecky Uncorks Huge Sprint to Snatch Paris-Roubaix Femmes on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
